<source lang="xml">

<settings> 
  <redraw>1</redraw>
  <type>column</type>
  <font>Tahoma</font>                
  <depth>20</depth>                  
  <angle>30</angle>  
  <width>$width$</width>
  <height>$height$</height>  
  <balloonColor>#ffffff</balloonColor>
  <column>
   <type>stacked</type>
    <width>70</width>                
    $if(growTime)$
    <grow_time>$growTime$</grow_time>
    $endif$         
    <grow_effect>strong</grow_effect>    
    <alpha>75</alpha>
    <balloon_text>          
    	<![CDATA[{description}: {value}<br/>({series})]]> 
    </balloon_text>    
  </column>
     
  <balloon>
    <fillColor>#ffffff</fillColor>
    <fillAlpha>100</fillAlpha>
    <cornerRadius>4</cornerRadius>
	<text_color>#000000</text_color>
	<border_width>1</border_width>
	<border_color>#5B5B63</border_color>
	<borderColor>#5B5B63</borderColor>
  </balloon>
  
    <legend>             
	    <enabled>false</enabled> 
    </legend>
    
    <values>
      <category>
        <rotate>5</rotate>
      </category>
      <value>
      </value>
    </values>
    
  
  <plot_area>              
    <margins>              
      <left>150</left>        
      <top>30</top>         
      <right>20</right>   
      <bottom>30</bottom>  
    </margins>

  </plot_area>
</settings>

</source>
